document.full_text: seven bald eagles found poisoned and near death in april at a northern wisconsin landfill are fully recovered and ready to be released back into the wild, a woman who helped nurse them back to health, marge gibson, said on friday.
document.title: bald eagles poisoned in wisconsin ready for release
lines_and_colors: seven bald eagles found poisoned and near death in april at a northern wisconsin landfill are fully recovered and ready to be released back into the wild, a woman who helped nurse them back to health, marge gibson, said on friday.
